DOC.brief_summary: Assessment of pharmacokinetics of Azelaic Acid Foam after repeated skin application and in comparison to Azelaic Acid gel. Assessment of safety after repeated skin application.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Azelaic Acid Foam, 15% in Papulopustular Rosacea
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of moderate papulopustular rosacea free of any clinically significant disease body weight less than 50 or more than 130 kg clinically significant disease which could interfere with the study
